description: My place is close to Chrysler Building, United Nations Plaza, Grand Central  Terminal, Fifth Avenue. You’ll love my place because of the views, the location, and the ambiance. My place is good for couples, solo adventurers, and business travelers.
name: 1 Bedroom in Luxury Midtown Apartment Building
review: Modern, clean apt.  Ryan was very helpful and check-in was convenient.  Location was a bit far from central spots, so be prepared to walk or subway.
